#summary Setting FEST modules as dependencies with Maven 2.
#labels Featured

FEST has its own [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven 2] repository located at [http://fest.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/fest/m2/repository/]

The `groupId` for all FEST modules is *fest*. The following table shows the `artifactId` for each module:

|| fest-assert ||
|| fest-mocks ||
|| fest-reflect ||
|| fest-swing ||
|| fest-swing-junit ||
|| fest-swing-testng ||
|| fest-util ||

Here is a quick example:

{{{
<groupId>fest</groupId>
<artifactId>fest-assert</artifactId>
<version>0.6</version>
}}}
